summary:
Experienced CIO, senior IT Director and Chief Digital Officer. Technology driven with a clear focus on business strategy, customer satisfaction and operational and cost efficiency. Strongly believes in an agile environment and way of working. Experienced in a broad area of Digital Transformation such as:  Omni-Channel, Customer Journey, Customer Intelligence & Insight, Big Data & analytics, ERP and Architectures.

Is a teambuilder and player, creative, building bridges, pragmatic, engaging, visionair and innovator. Is  transformational leader: Inspiring motivator, intellectual stimulating and individual involved. 

Specialized in Digital Transformation, Customer Experience & Omnichannel, IT Strategy & architecture, IT Management, Business & IT alignement, Change & Transition Management and Agile way of working. Inspiring people, let them interact and grow. Surprises the business with technology driven innovation created by self organizing and self steering teams.

More than 30 years of IT experience on both the IT services supplier side as well as overall responsibility for IT within a large organization. Experienced in IT infrastructural, applicative and innovative issues. Knows how to get the best out of organizations by bright agreements and short lines of communication, motivating the team and colleagues, creating optimal conditions, with a sense of politics, ethics and responsibility. 

Aligning business needs towards innovative digital solutions and vice versa is one of my passions. From my experience and background, I offer a unique contribution to both the role of trusted and creative advisor in the area of omni-channel customer interaction for both marketing executives and C-level.

profile_positions.description:
ShoppingTomorrow is the digital commerce platform for all e-commerce professionals. Together we explore, research and contribute to the transformation of B2C and B2B retail. What do future developments in business models, customer journey, technology, etc. mean for employees, companies and The Netherlands BV? The research platform was initiated in 2013 by Thuiswinkel.org and is now supported by 20+ Dutch industry and interest groups.

Member of the expert teams:
- Customer Experience Management (CEM)
- (Re)platforming
- Experienced Commerce
profile_positions.title: Expert ShoppingTomorrow: CEM & (Re)platforming & Experienced Commerce

profile_positions.description:
TBI consists of a group of companies that create sustainable solutions to renew, design and maintain the built environment. The group has a mixed portfolio of construction and engineering operations. Houses, offices, schools, hospitals, roads, tunnels, bridges, locks, factories and marine installations: our work can be seen throughout the Netherlands, from modest initiatives to major, high profile projects for public and private clients. TBI SSC-ICT Diensten B.V. delivers ICT services to the TBI group.

As Shared Service Centre (SSC) board member responsible for the operation, continuity, availability and security of the ICT services. 
My activities, responsibility and achievements includes:

- Provide the business 24x7 proces, information and systems continuity 
- Contribute to the realization of business objectives
- Improvement of customer satisfaction;
- Reduction of incidents
- Proces & efficiency optimization
- IT Service Desk 
- IT Workplace management
- IT Service Management
- Functional application management
- Project & portfoliomanagement
- ServiceNow implementation
- ITIL adoption
- Coach colleagues with the agile way of work
- IT supplier management
profile_positions.title: Operational Director

profile_positions.description:
Accell Group N.V. focuses internationally on the mid-range and higher segments of the market for bicycles and bicycle parts and accessories. The company has leading positions in the Netherlands, Belgium, Germany, Italy, France, Finland, Turkey, the United Kingdom and the United States. In Europe, Accell Group is market leader in the bicycle market measured in turnover. Accell Group’s best known brands in the Netherlands are Batavus, Sparta, Koga, Loekie and Babboe.
 
Accell Group and its subsidiaries employ approximately 3,000 people in eighteen countries worldwide. The company’s head office is located in Heerenveen (the Netherlands). In 2017, Accell Group sold around 1.3 million bicycles and recorded profitable turnover of over € 1 billion.

My activities, responsibility and achievements includes:
- Providing project management capacity (internal and external)
- Introduction of portfolio management and set up PMO in a short time (2 months)
- Improvement on project & portfolio management proces
- Advice and report to the IT Steering Committee on projects (includes all board members.
- Set up and execute improvement plans to raise level of maturity on contract management
- Reduction of total IT contract value in a short time
- Set up and execute improvement plans to raise the level of maturity on working under architecture
- Advise as a member of the Design Authority that focussed on the Omni-channel B2B and B2C sales and marketing strategy and the standardization of processes, technology and resources across countries and operating companies.
- As a member of the IT management team driving force in the realization of the new IT strategy supported by the organization. 
- Responsible for drawing up the annual IT plan and its realization within time and budget.
- Supported the implementation and roll out of in store digital signage solutions.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager Architecture & Project - & Contract Management

profile_positions.description:
PinTEquity endeavours to get its customers on the right track, providing them with knowledge along the way. By empowering the companies that we work with, we aim to help them acquire the knowledge required to continue a constructive growth process even after our collaboration has come to an end.

We map out ways in which technology – such as Big Data, Blockchain and IoT – fits into existing processes, focusing on benefits for our customers. We create and implement the digital transformation roadmap including that new technologies, with the emphasis on added value for the clients of PinTEquity.  

PinTEquity connects and helps start-ups and scale-ups with business development services e.g. Connected and Predictive Healthcare
profile_positions.title: Business Digital Transformation Technologist

profile_positions.description:
The Royal Dutch Touring Club ANWB, founded in 1883, offers a wide range of services related to roadside assistance and medical and repatriation assistance abroad, legal assistance, travel, information products, insurances, selling products and services in the areas of recreation, tourism and mobility. The ANWB supports 4.3 million members and about 3100 employees with an 1 Billion euro turnover. The road assistance handled in 2016 over 1 million breakdown incidents with a 89% successfully repaired on the spot.

As senior manager part of both the management team of ANWB Assistance (Hulpverlening) and the management team of ANWB IT.

My activities, responsibility and achievements includes:
- provide the business 24x7 proces, information and systems continuity 
- responsible for development and continuous deployment of all IT systems for the Assistance department
- contribute to the realization of business objectives
- prepare, implement and realize the annual IT plan
- active member of steering committee of Business Continuity Management program
- active member of steering committee of Renewal of the case management system of the Assistance Call Center
- active member of steering committee of the Communication Platform
- prepare and setup Big Data workshops, roadmap and initiation of pilots
- servant leader to the management team and towards the agile self steering teams
- above average Great Place To Work score for the department 
- strategic theme lead of Way of Work: setup annual plan, raising the level of maturity in the agile way of working, redefining the IT mission statement and its core values
- strategic theme lead of Innovation Strength: setup annual plan, creating innovation community and inspired and facilitated the innovation ambassadors
- contributed to preparation and implementation of the reorganization of the IT department
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager IT ANWB Hulpverlening
Business Development Director Digital Signage - Big Data & Analytics
Director ICT
Associate Director

profile_positions.description: Client/Server expert, Gupta (SQLWindows, SQLBase), Object Oriented Architect. Architect and developer of CRM and Campaign Management systems for IT education center. Architect and developer of a visual planning system for a international parcel services company.
profile_positions.title: Consultant
